title: How to Make a Duct Tape Ball

steps.headline: Get a ball (preferably foam or rubber).This will be the "mold" of your soon-to-be duct tape ball.
steps.description: Make sure it isn't too big, or you'll have a hard time covering it with duct tape.

steps.headline: Put small strips of duct tape on it one by one.If you don't have much time, you could just use big strips of duct tape instead, but you're more prone to messing up this way.
Keep doing that until the foam ball is completely covered.If you want to, you can add additional layers of duct tape, just don't add too much, or you won't have enough for another duct tape craft!
Personalize it!Write on it in Sharpie, or if it's big enough, have your friends sign it at the end of the school year.
steps.description: Just don't do anything profane if you intend to have it out in public or at school / work.
